entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
